basics.name: Long Giang Vu
basics.label: AI/Machine Learning Engineer
basics.summary: As a research assistant at DS Lab, SoICT, HUST, I work on developing and applying machine learning solutions to various problems, such as natural language processing, recommendation systems, and computer vision. I have received the Excellence Scholarship for two consecutive years. I also have industry experience as an AI engineer at TopCV Vietnam, where I contributed to the design and implementation of the recommendation system of the topcv.vn website, using deep learning techniques such as neural hash and learning to rank. Additionally, I developed and operated the duplicate checking and spelling correction systems, and created internal libraries for data preprocessing and index-preserving. I am passionate about learning new skills and technologies, and I am currently pursuing a certification in data engineering from IBM. I am fluent in English and Vietnamese, and proficient in Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, and SQL.
